__e: When we lost "The Purple Door" to River Rock, I just thought that's it for us.
And River Rock, it's... It's not the only game in town.
I want you to return to your first day at River Rock, and be the perfect assistant.
I need you to take everybody off of house-to-house and get them up to the Halbard place on River Road.
It only takes a minute, there is far from River Street.
River Road to the park and then back home.
James River was way worse than you said.
I know how much you love James River and how long we've known each other, so can we please dispense with the "hail fellow, well met" bullshit?
I-I'm just here to tell you that I'm staying at James River, and here are my conditions.
What's River doing in a book?
You telling me that there's a hole in Fox River that you don't want to get into?
River... in a completely sane world, is madness not the only freedom?
When the Doctor first meets River Song, she's someone from his future.
The Doctor gave you a message for River Song.
River Song didn't get it all from you, sweetie.
